page.title: 13RECREATION - GENERAL
page.content:
Recreation in this area means mainly {outdoor activities.} Many people{walk the lanes and footpaths, enjoying the peaceful commune with nature.
{Riders}of all ages and abilities{hack along the country lanes and bridle paths, some, like the walkers, just enjoying the countryside and others preparing their{horses}for later meets of the Meynell and South Staffordshire Hunt or for competitions.
The many{small pools are fished}by keen local fishermen, some of whom have formed a co-operative to retain the pools for local use, although visitors may buy day tickets.
The disused parts of the airfield are used to{fly model aircraft}and for {"banger" (car) racing.
